topics.body: You know I realized something: My top two favorite genres in science fiction and supernatural genres, but there's always a lot of scifi and such that always depicts "what if aliens are real" with them often being two extremes of them either being absolute evil or absolute good, but what if aliens or whatever <insert here> are 100% aware of us but they just don't give a shit.  Anyone here ever watch the tv Stargate?  What I mean by this is that what if all the "all powerful beings" are like the ascended ancients in that they simply don't give a shit about anyone?

To use a analogy it's like how a lot of people don't give a shit about the situation in Iraq with ISIS and care more about how tan snookie is.

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53bf6f7e6368721bb4e30400#post_53bf6f7e6368721bb4e30400

Say what you will about how much Bay loves explosions and chase scenes, but he makes them look good; he's commented he does such stunts for real because it wouldn't look as good if he used CG or models, and for the same reason he doesn't like greenscreen work. Gotta give him that
